QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT p.patient_id, p.ptnt_brth_yr_nbr, p.gndr_cde, p.etncy_1_desc, CASE p.etncy_1_desc WHEN 'CAUCASIAN' THEN 8527 WHEN 'BLACK/AFRICAN AMERICAN' THEN 8516 ELSE 0 END as RACE_CONCEPT_ID, CASE p.etncy_1_desc WHEN 'HISPANIC' THEN 38003563 ELSE 38003564 END as ETHNICITY_CONCEPT_ID, e.ecntr_id, e.ecntr_dte_tstmp, e.ecntr_typ_desc, e.ds_prvdr_id, 44814722 as PeriodTypeConceptId, CASE ecntr_typ_desc WHEN 'Inpatient' THEN 9201 ELSE 9202 END VISIT_CONCEPT_ID FROM {sc}.patient p JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND p.patient_id = ch.PERSON_ID JOIN {sc}.encounter e ON e.patient_id = p.patient_id order by p.patient_id
